item.title: Most Americans Now Say Retiring at 65 Is No Longer Realistic
item.description: Retiring at age 65 used to be the norm. Now many say it's a fantasy.

item.title: You Can Still Get a Tax Break for Buying an EV in These 13 States
item.description: States are expanding the financial incentives for people to buy electric vehicles now that the federal EV tax credit has expired.

item.title: Don’t Blame AI for the Crummy Job Market — Yet
item.description: New Yale research finds that underlying changes in the workforce predate the adoption of ChatGPT. So why is it so hard for new grads to get jobs?

item.title: Could the Government Shutdown Delay the Social Security COLA?
item.description: If the government shutdown continues, it may postpone or cancel the Oct. 15 inflation report, pushing back the 2026 COLA announcement.

item.title: Prime Cut: How to Get Your Share of Amazon’s $1.5 Billion FTC Settlement
item.description: The FTC accused Amazon in 2023 of enrolling tens of millions of customers into Prime using “sophisticated subscription traps designed to manipulate co...
